messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom]even traditional schoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Stop Rue!  My cheeks hurt! Nanci K. ***If you really want a laugh, ask Rue about her coffee experience. Valerie in sunny Tacoma
messages.messageBody:
>What is this obsession with making kids smarter,
>anyway? Why don't we try to make them taller, so
>they can reach things? Or, maybe...(snip) we can
>figure out how to make their toes grow longer so they
>can use their feet as hands. . ~Rue

Stop Rue! My cheeks hurt!

Nanci K.

***If you really want a laugh, ask Rue about her coffee experience.

Valerie in sunny Tacoma

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom]even traditional schoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Now, now Valerie, we can t give away all my secrets.  And has it ever occurred to you that if you didn t get up a 4:00 you wouldn t need so much coffee? ~Rue
messages.messageBody:
Now, now Valerie, we can't give away all my secrets. And has it ever
occurred to you that if you didn't get up a 4:00 you wouldn't need so much
coffee? ~Rue
